subject: Football

Football (College)
lead_paragraph: L.S.U. defensive back Tyrann Mathieu, Alabama linebacker Dont’a Hightower and Penn State defensive tackle Devon Still are the three finalists for the Chuck Bednarik Award.
snippet: L.S.U. defensive back Tyrann Mathieu, Alabama linebacker Dont’a Hightower and Penn State defensive tackle Devon Still are the three finalists for the Chuck Bednarik Award.
